turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. I'd like to order a pizza from Bella Luna, actually I'd like to order four medium, thin crust pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi there, how can i assisty you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what type of pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a Pepperoni Lovers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It was a alarm. I turned it off. Sorry. Can you repeat what you said? No, I'd like one pepperoni lovers, one sausage, pepperoni, and mushroom, one veggie lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: please turn down the music before we proceed.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like 4 pepperoni lover pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: and one taco.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, bella luna does not have tacos.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have Do they have a taco pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: unfortunately, they do not have taco pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like another type of pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, and to confirm, you said thin crust on all of those, right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah when they are all medium.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me read your order back to you. please confirm whether it's correct. 4 medium thin crust pizzas, 1 pepperoni lovers, 1 sausage pepperoni and mushroom, 1 veggie lovers, and 1 with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $52.91 will be the total and will take 25 minutes to prepare. would you like to purchase this now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas have been purchased. they'll be ready in 25 minutes for pick up. enjoy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
